mapper.select: SELECT JHJSD.DJBH, JHJSD.RQ, JHJSD.YDJH, JHJSD.QDDM, JHJSD.DM1, JHJSD.DM2, JHJSD.YGDM, JHJSD.DM4, JHJSD.RQ_1, JHJSD.RQ_2, JHJSD.JE_1, JHJSD.DAYS, JHJSD.SL, JHJSD.JE_3, JHJSD.JE_2, JHJSD.JE, JHJSD.JZR, JHJSD.JZRQ, JHJSD.JZ, JHJSD.ZSR, JHJSD.ZSRQ, JHJSD.ZS, JHJSD.JSR, JHJSD.JSRQ, JHJSD.JS, JHJSD.ZDR, JHJSD.RQ_4, JHJSD.BZ FROM JHJSD WHERE RQ BETWEEN #{lastMonthFirstDay} AND #{lastMonthLastDay} ORDER BY RQ, JHJSD.DJBH ASC

SELECT JHJSDMP.DJBH, JHJSDMP.DJXZ, JHJSDMP.LXDJ, JHJSDMP.RQ, JHJSDMP.SPDM, JHJSDMP.SL, JHJSDMP.JE_2, JHJSDMP.JE_3, JHJSDMP.JE, JHJSDMP.BYZD8, JHJSDMP.BZ, JHJSDMP.BYZD4, JHJSDMP.MIBH FROM JHJSDMP WHERE DJBH = #{DJBH}
SELECT GHSMC FROM GONGHUOSHANG WHERE GHSDM = #{dm1}
SELECT CKMC FROM CANGKU WHERE CKDM = #{dm2}
